description.p: The T-shirt shows the Fellowship logo and the text "Got Freedom?" on the front and the URL of the Fellowship page (www.fsfe.org) on the back.
The sleeveless shirt shows the Fellowship logo and the text "Freedom Fighter" on the front and the URL of the Fellowship page (www.fsfe.org) on the back.
